tasks.migrate: deno run --env-file=../.env -A  npm:knex --knexfile db/knexfile.js --knexpath db migrate:latest
tasks.make_migration: deno run -A  npm:knex --knexfile db/knexfile.js --knexpath db migrate:make
tasks.seed_make: deno run -A  npm:knex --knexfile db/knexfile.js --knexpath db seed:make
tasks.seed: deno run --env-file=../.env -A  npm:knex --knexfile db/knexfile.js --knexpath db seed:run
